two_factor.title: Two-factor authentication
two_factor.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account
two_factor.enabled_description: Two-factor authentication is enabled. When logging in, you will be asked for a secure PIN that you can retrieve from your authenticator app.
two_factor.disabled_description: Enable two-factor authentication for an extra layer of security. You will need a TOTP-compatible authenticator app like Google Authenticator or Authy.

recovery.title: 2FA Recovery codes
recovery.description: Recovery codes allow you to access your account if you lose your 2FA device. Keep them in a secure password manager.
recovery.info: Each recovery code can be used once to access your account and is then deleted. Need more? Click on Regenerate codes above.

setup.title: Enable two-factor authentication
setup.description: Scan the QR code or enter the key in your authenticator app to complete two-factor authentication setup
setup.description_verify: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
setup.description_enabled: Two-factor authentication is now enabled. Scan the QR code or enter the key in your authenticator app.

delete_account.description: Delete your account and all your data
delete_account.warning_text: Please note, this cannot be undone.
delete_account.dialog_title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
delete_account.dialog_description: Once your account is deleted, all your data will be permanently deleted. Enter your password to confirm that you want to permanently delete your account.
